DataElement.preferredName: Injury Tendon Or Ligament Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to the damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force to a band of fibrous connective tissue that joins bone to muscle or a band of fibrous tissue connecting bone to bone or cartilage to bone thereby supporting or strengthening a joint.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force to a band of fibrous connective tissue that joins bone to muscle or a band of fibrous tissue connecting bone to bone or cartilage to bone thereby supporting or strengthening a joint.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Concepts.definition: Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Property.preferredDefinition: A band of fibrous connective tissue that joins bone to muscle.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Band of fibrous tissue connecting bone to bone or cartilage to bone thereby supporting or strengthening a joint.

Concepts.definition: A band of fibrous connective tissue that joins bone to muscle.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Band of fibrous tissue connecting bone to bone or cartilage to bone thereby supporting or strengthening a joint.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
